Email_1.Subject: Your Simulation Run
Email_1.Body:
Unfortunately, you received the lowest score
    possible. That is a bit alarming, maybe you
    should pay attention to the finer details.
            
    Well, on to business matters. You are going to
    perform a real Pipeline Extraction. We suspect
    that there is a person in possession of
    illegal items.
            
    Good luck, I know you will do fine.

Email_2.Subject: Lowest Score Ever
Email_2.Body:
You just achieved the lowest score in DCPS
    history, how do you feel newbie?  Well, just
    try to be more observant next time.
